item.title: About
item.description: "A mind is a parachute, it doesn't work if you don't open it". E-mail Resumé Linkedin Github I graduated in Computer Science in 2021 at the University of Parma, Italy. I am junior software engineer and my current focus is Deep Learning: Self Supervised Learning Multi-modal learning Language models Reinforcement Learning I am also interested in life-long investing, longevity, sociology and visual arts.
